movies.title: Little Brother, Big Trouble: A Christmas Adventure
movies.plot: On Christmas Eve, Niko the young reindeer must find his little brother who has gone missing. But in order to save Christmas, it's going to take a lot of help from Niko's friends in order to save the day. While on his epic journey to save his brother, Niko learns the importance of friendship and family, in this heartwarming Holiday tale that all ages will enjoy.
movies.simplePlot: Set right before Christmas, Niko the reindeer must deal with his mom getting re-married and his being tasked with looking after his little stepbrother.

biography.bio: Erik Carlson is an actor, known for Little Brother, Big Trouble: A Christmas Adventure (2012).
biography.name: Erik Carlson

biography.bio: Mikko Kivinen was born on November 20, 1957 in Helsinki, Finland as Mikko Juhani Kivinen. He is an actor and writer, known for Herkku & Partanen (1995), Little Brother, Big Trouble: A Christmas Adventure (2012) and Kummeli Alivuokralainen (2008). He has been married to Elina Huusko since September 8, 2001. They have one child.
biography.name: Mikko Kivinen

biography.bio: Vuokko Hovatta was born on September 2, 1972 in Espoo, Finland. She is an actress, known for The Flight Before Christmas (2008), Little Brother, Big Trouble: A Christmas Adventure (2012) and Mystery of the Wolf (2006).
biography.name: Vuokko Hovatta

biography.bio: Aarre Karén was born on November 29, 1932 in Tokyo, Japan as Aarre Einari Karén. He is an actor, known for The Man Without a Past (2002), Nitrokabinetti (1997) and Little Brother, Big Trouble: A Christmas Adventure (2012). He has been married to Kirsti Kaarina Vasara since 1968. They have two children. He was previously married to Eira Jauckens.
biography.name: Aarre Karén

biography.bio: Elina Knihtilä was born on June 6, 1971 in Valkeala, Finland as Mari Elina Knihtilä. She is an actress and writer, known for Distractions (2015), Divorce à la finlandaise (2009) and The Good Son (2011). She is married to Tommi Korpela. They have one child.
biography.name: Elina Knihtilä

biography.bio: Riku Nieminen was born on May 5, 1986 in Kajaani, Finland. He is an actor and writer, known for 21 Ways to Ruin a Marriage (2013), Off Key (2015) and Kanelia kainaloon, Tatu ja Patu! (2016). He is married to Annika Poijärvi.
biography.name: Riku Nieminen

biography.bio: Juhana Vaittinen is an actor, known for Little Brother, Big Trouble: A Christmas Adventure (2012).
biography.name: Juhana Vaittinen

biography.bio: Juha Veijonen was born on August 29, 1959 in Helsinki, Finland. He is an actor and writer, known for Vares: Private Eye (2004), Les gros durs (1999) and Taivaan tulet (2007).
biography.name: Juha Veijonen

biography.bio: Katariina Kaitue was born on January 21, 1967 in Helsinki, Finland. She is an actress, known for Le pays du bonheur (1993), Life for Sale (2011) and On the Road to Emmaus (2001). She was previously married to Sakari Harima.
biography.name: Katariina Kaitue

biography.bio: Pertti Koivula was born on April 17, 1961 in Ranua, Finland. He is an actor and writer, known for A Summer by the River (1998), Le pays du bonheur (1993) and Perkele (2004). He was previously married to Henriikka Salo.
biography.name: Pertti Koivula

biography.bio: Kari Ketonen was born on August 16, 1971 in Espoo, Finland as Kari Mikael Ketonen. He is an actor and writer, known for Pelikaanimies (2004), Sauna (2008) and Ketonen & Myllyrinne (2006).
biography.name: Kari Ketonen

biography.bio: Jukka Rasila was born on August 12, 1969 in Oulu, Finland. He is an actor and writer, known for Jerico 2000 (1999), Un pari de foo...t! (2005) and Putous (2010).
biography.name: Jukka Rasila

biography.bio: Petri Manninen was born in 1965. He is an actor, known for Ambush (1999), Bad Luck Love (2000) and Badding (2000).
biography.name: Petri Manninen

biography.bio: Peik Stenberg is an actor, known for Little Brother, Big Trouble: A Christmas Adventure (2012), Break-In: The Anatomy of a Gig (1993) and Les moomins (1990).
biography.name: Peik Stenberg

biography.bio: Actor /Screenwriter Kari Hietalahti is best known for having appeared in several popular Finnish television series, such as Vintiöt, Ihmisten puolue, Ihmebantu, Pasila, Kimmo and Roba, and in films such as Hellsinki, Vares- Private eye and Boy Upside Down. In August 2011, Hietalahti's first book "Kenraali Pancho & Pojat - Suuri kalottikirja" was published. Hietalahti likes flyfishing and he is an Ambassador of the Vision Fly Fishing.
biography.name: Kari Hietalahti
